name: VAPINGDEBUNKED
0:
”Alexa, open vaping debunked”
”Alexa, start vaping debunked”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vaping debunked
des:
The “Vaping Debunked” trivia game will enable Alexa to ask participants a series of randomized trivia questions to educate teens, parents, and educators about the harms of teen e-cigarette use. During the game, Alexa will speak the question and provide multiple choice answers for players to choose from. Once a player selects an answer, Alexa will reveal whether the response was correct and provide an accompanying follow-up fact. Vaping Debunked aims to help dispel misperceptions and reinforce facts about the dangers and risks associated with vaping. Thank you for playing!

The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial the local emergency response phone number.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
